hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -n "${DevelopmentDomain}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property DevelopmentDomain \ --value ${DevelopmentDomain} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionDatabaseIP}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionDatabaseIP \ --value ${ProductionDatabaseIP} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionDatabaseUsername}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionDatabaseUsername \ --value ${ProductionDatabaseUsername} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionDatabaseName}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionDatabaseName \ --value ${ProductionDatabaseName} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionDatabasePassword}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionDatabasePassword \ --value ${ProductionDatabasePassword} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${DevelopmentStripeSecretKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property DevelopmentStripeSecretKey \ --value ${DevelopmentStripeSecretKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${DevelopmentStripePublicKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property DevelopmentStripePublicKey \ --value ${DevelopmentStripePublicKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionStripePublicKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionStripePublicKey \ --value ${ProductionStripePublicKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionStripeSecretKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionStripeSecretKey \ --value ${ProductionStripeSecretKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${LogglyUrl}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property LogglyUrl \ --value ${LogglyUrl} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${SESUsername}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property SESUsername \ --value ${SESUsername} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${SESPassword}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property SESPassword \ --value ${SESPassword} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${SESMailer}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property SESMailer \ --value ${SESMailer} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionRedisDomain}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionRedisDomain \ --value ${ProductionRedisDomain} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionDomain}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionDomain \ --value ${ProductionDomain} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${SSLCertificateArn}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property SSLCertificateArn \ --value ${SSLCertificateArn} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${S3Bucket}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property S3Bucket \ --value ${S3Bucket} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionAutoscalingGroupMinSize}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionAutoscalingGroupMinSize \ --value ${ProductionAutoscalingGroupMinSize} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionAutoscalingGroupMaxSize}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionAutoscalingGroupMaxSize \ --value ${ProductionAutoscalingGroupMaxSize} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${DevelopmentAutoscalingGroupMinSize}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property DevelopmentAutoscalingGroupMinSize \ --value ${DevelopmentAutoscalingGroupMinSize} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${DevelopmentAutoscalingGroupMaxSize}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property DevelopmentAutoscalingGroupMaxSize \ --value ${DevelopmentAutoscalingGroupMaxSize} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${Language}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property Language \ --value ${Language} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${InstanceType}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property InstanceType \ --value ${InstanceType} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${EncryptionKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property EncryptionKey \ --value ${EncryptionKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${NewRelicKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property NewRelicKey \ --value ${NewRelicKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${IntercomAppId}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property IntercomAppId \ --value ${IntercomAppId} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${IntercomApiSecret}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property IntercomApiSecret \ --value ${IntercomApiSecret} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${IntercomApiKey}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property IntercomApiKey \ --value ${IntercomApiKey} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
if [ -n "${ProductionLoadbalancerName}" ] then ruby ${WORKSPACE}/lib/set_properties.rb --sdbdomain ${SIMPLEDB_STACK} \ --property ProductionLoadbalancerName \ --value ${ProductionLoadbalancerName} \ --itemname properties else echo "staying the same" fi
